snippet.title: A Purrtato Tail - Hope Trailer (Updated)
snippet.description:
Wishlist A Purrtato Tail now on Steam! http://bit.ly/PurrtatoOnSteam
Join our community on Discord! http://discord.gg/PurrtatoTail

Step in the paws of Pixel - Queen of the Potato Cats, better known as the Purrtatoes! When the Elderstar - adviser to the Queen - is kidnapped by the mysterious Nightshade creatures, a chain of events is put into motion that threatens all cat fruit and cat vegetable creatures on the Isle of Moar. Pixel leaves the safety of her kingdom and, building a growing party of mismatched cats from across the island, uses their unique capability to stick together to form bridges to pass chasms and ledges to reach new heights. A Purrtato Tail features open-world 2D platforming combined with JRPG and puzzle elements, Tea crafting, collectible stat-changing clothing, a talent tree, in-game collectible card game, and 30-50 hours of story-driven gameplay. Can Pixel discover the root of the Nightshade conspiracy before it is too late?

Coming to TurboPlay, Steam, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch.
